bollywood.title: Radhe: Your Most Wanted Bhai
bollywood.description: An action-packed thriller about a cop who takes on the drug mafia to rid the city of crime.

bollywood.title: Shershaah
bollywood.description: A biographical war film based on the life of Captain Vikram Batra, an Indian Army officer who was martyred in the Kargil War.

bollywood.title: Bell Bottom
bollywood.description: A spy thriller set in the 1980s, revolving around a covert operation to rescue hostages from a hijacked plane.

bollywood.title: Sooryavanshi
bollywood.description: An action-packed film about an anti-terrorism squad officer who must stop a terrorist attack in Mumbai.

bollywood.title: Animal
bollywood.description: A suspense thriller about a group of friends who encounter a mysterious creature during their wilderness camping trip.

bollywood.title: Leo
bollywood.description: A heartwarming family drama about a young boy named Leo who embarks on a journey of self-discovery after finding a mysterious treasure map.

bollywood.title: Brahmastra
bollywood.description: A fantasy adventure film directed by Ayan Mukerji, featuring Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt in lead roles.

bollywood.title: Dhoom 4
bollywood.description: The fourth installment in the action-packed Dhoom franchise, featuring high-speed bike chases and thrilling heists.

bollywood.title: Lal Singh Chaddha
bollywood.description: An adaptation of the Hollywood film Forrest Gump, starring Aamir Khan in the titular role.

bollywood.title: Dhamaka
bollywood.description: A thriller film starring Kartik Aaryan as a news anchor who gets embroiled in a hostage situation during a live broadcast.

bollywood.title: Pathaan
bollywood.description: An action-packed film featuring Shah Rukh Khan as a spy, marking his comeback to the big screen after a hiatus.

bollywood.title: Bachchan Pandey
bollywood.description: A comedy-action film starring Akshay Kumar as a gangster who aspires to become an actor.

bollywood.title: Adipurush
bollywood.description: An epic mythological film based on the Hindu epic Ramayana, starring Prabhas as Lord Rama.

hollywood.title: The Batman
hollywood.description: A dark and gritty reboot of the Batman franchise, directed by Matt Reeves, featuring Robert Pattinson as the titular character.

hollywood.title: Avatar 2
hollywood.description: The highly anticipated sequel to James Cameron's groundbreaking film, Avatar, continuing the story of the Na'vi and their struggle against human exploitation on Pandora.

hollywood.title: Jurassic World: Dominion
hollywood.description: The latest installment in the Jurassic Park franchise, directed by Colin Trevorrow, featuring the return of iconic dinosaurs and characters from the original films.

hollywood.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
hollywood.description: A sequel to the highly successful Black Panther film, exploring the legacy of T'Challa and the future of Wakanda following the passing of Chadwick Boseman.

hollywood.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
hollywood.description: The fourth installment in the Thor series, directed by Taika Waititi, featuring Chris Hemsworth as Thor and Natalie Portman as the Mighty Thor.

hollywood.title: Mission: Impossible 8
hollywood.description: The eighth installment in the Mission: Impossible franchise, starring Tom Cruise as Ethan Hunt, continuing his adrenaline-fueled missions.

hollywood.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
hollywood.description: The third installment in the Fantastic Beasts series, following the adventures of Newt Scamander and exploring the early life of Albus Dumbledore.

hollywood.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
hollywood.description: The latest Spider-Man film, directed by Jon Watts, featuring Tom Holland as Peter Parker and exploring the multiverse with appearances from past Spider-Man actors.
